meaningMnemonic: When an <kanji>author</kanji> <kanji>appear</kanji>s in public it's always <vocabulary>remarkable</vocabulary>. People usually don't remember there's anyone behind those pages, so when the actual author shows up in person it's pretty <vocabulary>striking</vocabulary>.
readingMnemonic: This is a jukugo word that uses the on'yomi readings of the kanji. You should be able to read this on your own.
